[Home](index.md) &gt; [@al/common](common.md) &gt; [AlRoute](common.alroute.md)

## AlRoute class

An AlRoute is an instantiated route definition, attached to a routing host, and capable of actually calculating target URLs based on context and handling navigation events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AlRoute 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(host, definition, parent)](./common.alroute._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>AlRoute</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [deleteProperty(propName)](./common.alroute.deleteproperty.md) |  | Deletes a property. If the immutable route definition contains the same property, it will be restored. |
|  [disable()](./common.alroute.disable.md) |  | Disables a route |
|  [dispatch()](./common.alroute.dispatch.md) |  | "Executes" a route. This invokes the <code>dispatch</code> method on whatever routing host was provided to the menu at load time. |
|  [empty()](./common.alroute.empty.md) | <code>static</code> | Generates an empty route attached to a null routing host |
|  [evaluateActivation()](./common.alroute.evaluateactivation.md) |  | Evaluates the activation state of the route |
|  [evaluateCondition(condition)](./common.alroute.evaluatecondition.md) |  | Evaluates an AlRouteCondition recursively.<!-- -->Internally, the methods compiles boolean results of a) nested conditions b) route parameters or parameter expressions c) path matches d) entitlements or other externally calculated conditions And then uses a simple reducer to roll up all results based on the condition rule, which defaults to 'all'. |
|  [evaluateHref(action)](./common.alroute.evaluatehref.md) |  | Evaluates the HREF for an route with action type 'link' |
|  [evaluateParameterExpression(expression)](./common.alroute.evaluateparameterexpression.md) |  | Determine whether a route parameter test is true or not |
|  [evaluatePathMatch(pathMatches)](./common.alroute.evaluatepathmatch.md) |  | Determines whether a path pattern matches the current URL |
|  [evaluateRouteOptions()](./common.alroute.evaluaterouteoptions.md) |  |  |
|  [findChild(idPath)](./common.alroute.findchild.md) |  | Retrieves a nested child route by matching bookmarks, captions, IDs, or numerical indices. |
|  [getActivationCursor()](./common.alroute.getactivationcursor.md) |  | This method will return the deepest activated, childless route within its first activated child. If this sounds obtuse, it is -- but's it's important for determining the "cursor" menu item within a menu hierarchy. |
|  [getActivationCursorFlat()](./common.alroute.getactivationcursorflat.md) |  | This method uses the method above to generate a flat array of activated menu items, from top to bottom, or undefined if no child of the given menu is activated. |
|  [getProperty(propName, defaultValue)](./common.alroute.getproperty.md) |  | Retrieves a property. |
|  [getRouteAction()](./common.alroute.getrouteaction.md) |  | Retrieves the route's action, which may be a shared "named" route or embedded directly into the route's definition. |
|  [link(host, locationId, path, caption)](./common.alroute.link.md) | <code>static</code> |  |
|  [refresh(resolve)](./common.alroute.refresh.md) |  | Refreshes the state of a given route. |
|  [setAction(action)](./common.alroute.setaction.md) |  | Updates the route to use a specified action |
|  [setCallback(callback)](./common.alroute.setcallback.md) |  | Updates the route to use a specific callback action. |
|  [setProperty(propName, value)](./common.alroute.setproperty.md) |  | Sets an arbitrary property for the route |
|  [summarize(showAll, depth)](./common.alroute.summarize.md) |  | Diagnostic method for logging the current hierarchy and state of a given navigational tree. Excluded from unit test coverage because no production code should utilize it! |
|  [toHref()](./common.alroute.tohref.md) |  | Retrieves the full URL for a route, if applicable. |
